alert.note: Alert for Northern Wayne; Susquehanna (Pennsylvania) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Binghamton (South Central New York and Northeastern Pennsylvania)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 01 at 1:32PM EDT by NWS Binghamton
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Susquehanna and northwestern Wayne Counties through 200 PM EDT... At 132 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Thompson, or 13 miles southwest of Deposit, moving southeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Susquehanna, Susquehanna Depot, Ararat, Lanesboro, Thompson, Starrucca, Hiawatha, Shehawken, Starlight and Starruca. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
